alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:22AM CDT until April 27 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR ASCENSION AND SOUTHEASTERN IBERVILLE PARISHES... At 521 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Castle, or near Plaquemine, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, White Castle, Sorrento, Prairieville, Geismar and Carville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 171 and 189. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
